title: Interpretation of seeing children in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: Children in a dream is one of the common visions that many people see, which surprises and surprises them and makes them wonder a lot about the implications of this vision and whether it indicates good or bad. Through this article, we will explain everything in the following lines to reassure the heart of the dreamer. Children in a dream Meaning: Interpretation of a vision Children in a dream indicates that the dreamer has good morals and a good reputation among many people around him. In the event that a man sees the presence of children in his dream, this is a sign of major changes that will occur in his life, which will be a reason to change the entire course of his life for the better. When The dreamer sees the presence of children in his dream, this symbolizes that he will be able to get rid of all the negative thoughts and actions that affected his life and actions all the time and were the reason that he found himself in a very nervous state and lack of good focus in his life. If one sees a beautiful child in his dream, then this It indicates that he will make the right decision that will be the reason that he will soon obtain everything he wants and desires. A man who sees a dead person carrying a child in a dream indicates that he will be exposed to a small financial crisis that he will be able to get rid of without affecting him too much. Children in a dream by Ibn Sirin, said the scholar Ibn Sirin. Seeing children in a dream means that the dreamer is going through many happy circumstances that will make him feel comfortable and reassured in his life for the coming periods. If a man sees the presence of children in his dream, this is a sign that God will change all his circumstances and make him much better than before. When the dreamer suffers from There are many financial crises that he is constantly exposed to in his life, and he witnesses the presence of children in his sleep, then this is strong evidence that God will save him from all of this soon. If a man sees an ugly child in a dream, this means that he will go through many experiences and difficulties that will be the reason for him to He will be in a state of exhaustion and excessive fatigue in the coming periods, and God is Greatest and Knows Best. What is the interpretation of seeing children in a single woman’s dream? The interpretation of seeing children in a dream for an unmarried woman is a good dream that indicates the appearance of many good things that will make them able to achieve To all their wants and desires as quickly as possible without facing major difficulties and obstacles. In the event that a girl sees many children in her dream, this is a sign that she will enter into many successful projects that will return to her life with a lot of money and large profits that will be an essential factor in improving her level. . From life. When a girl sees herself playing with a small child in her dream, it means that she is surrounded by many people who wish her the best, success, and success in her life, personal or professional, and that they are also all the time to stand by her in difficult times. Seeing a child whose features are not clear during If a single person sleeps, this is evidence of the emergence of many undesirable things in his life, which will be the reason why he will always remain in a state of extreme psychological tension and nervousness. Children in a dream for a woman

title: What did scientists say about the interpretation of a dream about a broken phone?

preview.html: Interpretation of dreams about breaking a mobile phone: The mobile phone is the most used means at the present time to communicate with others, as the mobile phone allows its users to quickly reach all people in any geographical area, and it also allows the acquisition of many knowledge and arts and learning about different cultures, but in the case of the cell phone it breaks in A dream what does it mean? Seeing a broken phone expresses many associations that vary depending on certain details, and this will be explained in the following article. Interpretation of dreams of breaking a mobile phone: Seeing a mobile phone in a dream indicates multiple messages that the dreamer has been tasked with delivering or working on in accordance with them in order to achieve many goals. In which nothing will be achieved unless some of the conditions contained in the message are met. If one sees a wanderer, this indicates that he has received some news of great importance to him and feels great joy at the proximity of the desired goal. As for the interpretation of the dream of breaking a telephone or a telephone in a dream, This vision expresses entering into many problems and disagreements that may lead to an unpleasant separation. Seeing a broken mobile phone in a dream also indicates a separation between the dreamer and some people close to him, as the family ties that connected him to his family may be severed. This vision It is also an indication of the cessation of many of the work that the dreamer has recently begun and the difficulty of achieving precisely planned goals due to the critical circumstances that the dreamer is going through, and these circumstances are mostly beyond his control and not caused by them. The vision may indicate receiving sad news that may directly affect proposals and plans. Which he intends to implement in the near future, which may expose him to a huge loss that he will not bear the cost of. Seeing a mobile phone in general symbolizes a state of mobility in the life of the dreamer, as he can travel in the coming period to fulfill some interests or to search for opportunities that suit his ambitions and ideas. In the event of seeing it For a broken mobile phone, this indicates the obstacles that prevent him from setting off and traveling and the many problems that suddenly appear and keep him away from everything he had planned. Seeing from this angle is a sign of depression and despair, stopping and going back without being able to start again or get what You want. If the mobile phone breaks completely, this symbolizes that he is exposed to ill health that may last for some time and urges him to postpone all his own projects and stay in bed until he regains his full strength and wakes up again. Interpretation of seeing a broken mobile phone in a dream by Ibn Sirin. We cannot be sure that Ibn Sirin was He has his own interpretation of seeing a mobile phone in a dream, but we can distinguish some evidence through the process of analogy, by comparing the mobile phone to other means of communication and delivering messages in the past, such as pigeons and animals, the information messenger and the named phone, and we explain this as follows: Seeing the phone indicates Mobile in a dream to fully prepare and prepare to receive

title: Interpretation of the symbol of charity in a dream

preview.html: In our article today, we will discuss the interpretation of the symbol of charity in a dream, as charity is one of the most important things that God Almighty and His Noble Messenger urged us to do, because it extinguishes the Lord’s wrath and relieves sadness. And that all the poor and needy will benefit, and that charity may be in the form of money, clothing, or even a kind word. There are those who see in his vision that he is giving charity or that someone is giving it to him and does not know the interpretation from what he saw. Interpretation scholars such as Ibn Sirin, Al-Nabulsi, and Ibn Shaheen have provided many interpretations of this. Visions vary depending on the condition of the dreamer. Interpretation of the symbol of charity in a dreamInterpretation of charity in a dream by Ibn Sirin The scholar Ibn Sirin says that charity in a dream is a symbol of kindness, feeding, and healing the sick. It also symbolizes in general that the dreamer is characterized by honesty in his life. One of the most promising visions is the dream of charity, It indicates the dreamer's salvation from his problems and worries. This vision also indicates that the dreamer will soon get a promotion if he is an employee or have a lot of money if he works in agriculture. If one sees in a dream that he is giving charity something that cannot be given to charity, such as Wine, the dream indicates that he does not manage all the affairs of his life, whether on the family or professional level. Whoever sees in his dream that he has received alms, this indicates that God Almighty will achieve in his life what He desires. Interpretation of charity in a dream by Ibn Shaheen Ibn Shaheen says that whoever He saw in his dream that he is giving alms to someone he knows, then his dreams show that the dreamer loves that person very much and cares for him. Dreaming that we are giving alms from money obtained by illegal means is a sign that the dreamer is suffering from mismanagement of his money. But if the alms are Of lawful money, this vision means that God Almighty will make the Prophet a word with which he will guide some people. Al-Nabulsi’s interpretation of charity in a dreamFrom Al-Nabulsi’s point of view, charity in a dream symbolizes the death of sadness. A dream of receiving alms in it is an indication that the dreamer will face many problems and difficulties Before he succeeds in his life. Distributing charitable works in a dream indicates that a lot of profits will be achieved if the dreamer works in trade. As for whoever sees in his dream that he is giving alms to associations, his dreams indicate that God Almighty will grant him many good things. Charity in a dream To the True Imam: Imam Al-Sadiq says that giving alms to the poor and needy in a dream indicates that the dreamer enjoys psychological and material stability and feels secure in his life. If the dreamer is a scholar, then his dreams indicate that there are many people who will benefit from his knowledge. Seeing alms in the dream of single peopleIf a non-married woman dreams For a married woman to give alms to someone, her dream indicates that she seeks to meet the needs of the weak and needy and always stands by them. Whoever sees in her dream that she is sitting on the street and the world is giving her alms, this means that God will give her what she needs in her life. And if the dreamer receives alms Her elders, this is evidence that she has a good reputation and a high status among the people. But if H

title: Interpretation of seeing a needle in a dream: Needle and thread in a dream

preview.html: The meaning of needles for an unmarried girl, for a married woman, for a pregnant woman, whether she is a seamstress or a doctor, in the hand, tingling in the body, and seeing black or white threads by Ibn Sirin. Interpretation of a dream about a needle by Ibn Sirin. The scholar Ibn Sirin interpreted in a dream the thread of his clothes and he was poor. Seeing a person eating a needle In a dream, it symbolizes a person who reveals a secret to someone who will harm him. Seeing a needle with a thread on it in a dream is a meeting of the parents after separation and symbolizes the end of the disputes and crises that the dreamer is going through. Seeing a needle in a dream indicates striving or striving to achieve justice. Whoever sees in his hand a needle to thread with, this indicates regularity and uprightness. Your movements and the satisfaction of your needs. A needle in a dream indicates familiarity. Breaking a needle in a dream is a sign of stumbles, setbacks, and discrimination, whether on a professional or personal level. When receiving a needle as a gift, the vision indicates that the situation will improve for the pioneer and those with him. Eating a needle indicates mastery of work and a good result. A large number of needles indicates... Goodness and justice, whether seen or bought. Seeing yourself threading a needle means that you carry the worries of others more than you carry the worries of your family. As for the vision of searching for a needle, it indicates worry and anxiety for free. Finding a needle means making friends that will make you happy. If the dreamer sees that he is using a needle, this indicates his approach. From something bad that may cause him frustration. And if the dreamer inserts a thread into the needle, this indicates that he is concerned about the affairs of others and carries family worries. But if he searches for the needle, this means that he is worried about others, but no one worries him. If the dreamer finds a needle, This indicates that he will find friends who will make him happy, and if the needle breaks, this indicates poverty and loneliness. If the dreamer uses the needle to sew in the dream, this is evidence that he will return to do pending work and you will return to him with money, but if the needle breaks, it means that the work will stop and be dispersed. If the dreamer eats Needle in dreams It symbolizes the approaching marriage of a single person. Anyone who sees a broken needle in his dreams indicates loss of money, anxiety, separation, and separation between the family. The needle in the dream also symbolizes the wife, the daughter, and the good condition of the one who sees it. What does the needle mean in the dream? When the dreamer uses the needle in his dream to sew, this is a sign However, he will restart some faltering businesses that will bring him significant financial gains. If the needle breaks in the context of the dream, this portends the cessation of these actions. Finding a needle in a dream indicates many friends who will enter the dreamer’s life and make him happy. As for inserting the needle into the thread, the dreamer predicts a close connection or marriage. How can seeing the thread be interpreted In a dream? The thread generally symbolizes diverse and complex paths in a dream

title: Number 16 in a married woman’s dream

preview.html: In addition to the details of the vision itself, the condition, shape, color, and size of the number that appeared, we explain this to you today through the following lines from our website gptafser.com/, so follow us.Interpretation of seeing the number 16 in a single woman’s dream: A single girl dreamed in a dream that she won first place in her studies. It is a praiseworthy vision for a wise woman and shows that she is a loving person and shares feelings of love with everyone around her, and God knows best. Seeing the number 16 in a dream about one girl in a dream. The dream symbolizes that she will enjoy the abundance of her blessings, and God knows best. As for the unmarried girl who dreamed of obtaining a position The second is in studying while sleeping. A promising vision for her that she will get married soon, and God knows best. The number 16 appeared in a dream for an unmarried girl and she was happy when she saw it in the dream. A sign of her feeling of calm and stability in her life with her family, and God knows best. But if the unmarried girl sees that she is celebrating With her engagement number 16 in a dream. A sign or symbol of the number of years she will spend with her fiancé after marriage, and God knows best. Seeing the number 16 written in red in a dream for a single girl, which indicates the day of her engagement to the young man she loves. As for when the number 16 written in green appears in the dream For a single girl. It is a good vision of goodness and abundance in the diet and good health and goodness for the dreamer, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of seeing the number 3 in a dream. Interpretation of seeing the number 16 in a dream for a married woman. A married woman dreams of seeing the number 16 in a dream. Good news that the dreamer will become pregnant soon, which makes her You feel happy and joyful, and God knows best. Vision No. 16, which is written in beautiful handwriting, is in a dream about a married woman. It seems that she is enjoying a stable and quiet married life. And when a married woman sees that she is taking sick leave after 16 days in a dream. It is a sign of the dreamer’s recovery from the illness that She suffers from it, and God knows best. It also indicates that her life with her husband does not exceed 16 years, and God knows best. The number 16 is written in elegant black in a married woman’s dream. Good news for the fortuneteller to obtain a promotion at her work. Perhaps it symbolizes the strength of her character and her courage in life in general. It indicates her husband’s high status in society, and God knows best. Seeing the number 16, written in green, in a dream about a married woman. A good indication of feeding her children and raising them well, and God knows best. Interpretation of seeing the number 16 in a dream for a man and its meaning. A man seeing the number 16 in a dream. It is a sign that the dreamer feels safe and has a peaceful and blessed life in his life in general. Seeing the number 16 in a dream for a man, and it was written in black script in the dream. It symbolizes that the servant is patient and strong and that he is a person with a great passion for life, and God knows best. It also indicates that the servant is patient and strong and that he is a person with a great passion for life, and God knows best. He seeks and tries to achieve his ambitions and goals in life, and God knows best. Seeing the number 16 in brown in a dream for a man. It is an unfavorable vision because it is a number that the dreamer is not optimistic about in his life, and God knows best. As for the appearance of the number 16 in a man’s dream, it is written in faded handwriting. A bad sign. That he will fail in an important matter in his life that may have a cause

title: Interpretation of a dream about black ants by Ibn Sirin and the great translators

preview.html: Dream interpretation of black ants in a dream, seeing black ants in a dream is one of the important visions that carries with it many different interpretations, including what symbolizes good or bad. According to the symbol of the vision, and this is what I will tell you in this article. Interpretation of a dream about black ants: Black ants in a dream walking on the body of a bedridden person is evidence of survival and recovery soon, and it also symbolizes a large number of offspring, whether children or relatives surrounding you. When seeing swarms of ants Invading the house, Ibn Shaheen interpreted it as a lot of worries and anxieties that the dreamer experiences about his life and the future of his family and he needs to relieve his mind a little from these things to do so. Do not get sick. Seeing black ants walking on clothes symbolizes that the fortuneteller is completely dissatisfied with his life and wants to change it for the better. Walking on hair is undesirable and portends illness. Interpretation of a dream about black ants by Ibn Sirin. A dream about ants collecting food to store is evidence of the positive changes that the dreamer is going through In his life, in addition to his ability to manage crises well and get out of them without losses. Seeing ants spread throughout the house and on the walls is a vision that warns the dreamer that he suffers from envy and witchcraft and must strengthen himself with the memory of God in order to overcome all these evils that surround him. To see that black ants are flying in the air in the house is a bad vision, and Ibn Sirin says about it, that it is a warning of the death of the fortuneteller, God forbid, or the death of a relative suffering from an illness, but it is for him. A trip in the workplace is an increase in nutrition. Interpretation of a dream about black ants for a single woman. Imam Al-Nabulsi interpreted it, dreaming of black ants in a virgin girl’s room or surrounding her, as bad friends surrounding the girl and she must beware of their presence in her life before they cause her trouble and distress. Dreaming of black ants walking on clothes is evidence that the girl cares a lot about her external appearance, which leads her to be overconfident, without caring about the essence of things. If an unmarried girl sees black ants in the workplace, this is good and she will soon be promoted, but it is a warning to her. Also that she spends a lot of money on worthless things. Interpretation of a dream about black ants for a married woman: Black ants in a married woman’s dream are considered a sign of earning a lot of money, a significant increase in livelihood, or obtaining an inheritance soon, in the event that she sees swarms of ants infiltrating the Her home. As for Ibn Shaheen, he mentioned that black ants in the life of a barren woman who wishes to have children are good news for her that she will soon become pregnant and give birth to a beautiful boy, God willing. Black ants coming out of the kitchen or in general from the house is not considered a good vision for a married woman, and Imam Ibn Shaheen says Sirin: It is loss of livelihood, distress in financial life, and family disputes. Interpretation of a dream about black ants for a pregnant woman. Seeing black ants in a dream for a pregnant woman without fear of them is evidence of the birth of a male child who will have a destiny.

title: Interpretation of serving coffee in a dream by Ibn Sirin and interpretation of a dream of serving coffee to a person

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about serving coffee in a dream: Coffee is the favorite drink for many and the most widespread around the world, and there are many ways to serve coffee based on the individual’s desire. The tropical regions of South America, South Asia, and the Indian subcontinent are the first deposits of coffee, but what is important for us in this context is to mention the connotations. And cases of seeing an offer of coffee in a dream. Offering coffee in a dream. Seeing coffee expresses thought and precision before pronouncing any decision, slowness when making decisions, moderation in speech and action, and walking according to specific instructions that cannot be deviated from. And if someone sees coffee, then this vision is a reflection For his mood, it can be cloudy or clear, and the vision is an explanation of his current position and situation, hence the need to work on liberation from what disturbs his mood. And he tends towards what raises his mood and changes his mood. Regarding the interpretation of a dream about serving coffee, this vision indicates that there is an upcoming project on the way or entering into a partnership with one of them and talking in order to reach a unified formula and visions that express the goals of both parties. The same previous vision also symbolizes sovereignty, helping the needy, gaining fame and a high level, and supervising the service of others, because the servant of the people is their master. If the fortuneteller sees that he served coffee, this indicates the coming of some important events and meetings in which he will have the greatest role and necessity. Prepare to go out with a decent appearance, as the person may have many opportunities that he was looking forward to. But if you are offered coffee, it means that you are making some offers or going out with great benefit and discovering some suspicions that confuse you and disturb your sleep. Offering coffee in a dream to Sirinola’s son It must be made clear that Ibn Sirin did not witness coffee in his time, and his books lack clarifications and explanations about seeing coffee. However, we can distinguish some clues through the process of measurement and correlation, and this becomes clear as follows: Seeing coffee in a dream shows the different nature, the mood that varies from one person to another, the ambitions that surround a person from every aspect and the goals that have been planned with great precision. If one sees coffee, this is an indication of future plans and projects, events and situations that he faces in his life and the great challenges that he sees. And if the dreamer sees that he is serving coffee, this means that he is working to benefit others, meet their needs, and reach convincing visions and practical solutions regarding the differences and conflicts that It destroys relationships and separates those close to them. If one sees that he is serving coffee in the family home, this indicates strengthening relationships and kinship ties and building a solid bridge that cannot be cut in any way. The vision can be an indication of ambition to build partnerships that achieve profit and mutual benefit between all parties. But if the coffee is crushed on the ground, this indicates goodness, the death of impending disaster and evil, and liberation from a conspiracy that has been very tightly organized. But if you see that someone is offering you...

title: Interpretation of a dream about black shoes in detail

preview.html: Interpretation of the dream of black shoes in a dream in detail. Shoes are what a person wears to protect his old shoes from what he does on Earth, where they were discovered a long time ago and many shapes, types and colors were invented. Seeing shoes in a dream is a vision that does not carry with it many interpretations and connotations. The interpretation varies according to the color of the shoe and also varies depending on the person’s condition, and today we will explain to you the interpretation of a dream about black shoes in a dream in detail and in different situations. Interpretation of a dream about black shoes for single women: An unmarried girl who sees black shoes in her dream, then this dream indicates that the one who marries her will do so soon, This person has good qualities and good morals. But if he sees many shoes and tries to choose one of them, then this dream symbolizes that there are many people who are suitable for this girl and he thinks a lot about the best person among them. If the black shoes have some dirt and need to be cleaned, then this dream means That the girl suffers from problems that she cannot solve on her own and that she wants to help, but she feels lonely and no one cares about her. One of the unfavorable visions for the fiancée is that she sees in her dream that her shoes are lost. This dream indicates that this girl is creating problems between her and her fiancé, and this will lead to the breakup of the engagement, and this will cause her great sadness. Interpretation of a dream about black shoes for a pregnant woman If a pregnant woman sees black shoes in her dream and is happy with them and their beautiful color, this indicates that God Almighty He will give her a beautiful girl and she will be a good daughter to her parents. And if the shoes she wears in her dream are wide shoes, then this dream means that God Almighty will also bless her with a child whom she will give birth to with much goodness and abundance, God willing. Some interpreters say that seeing a pregnant woman wearing black shoes in her dream It indicates that God Almighty will take care of her in an easy and smooth way and she will not suffer from any health problems during pregnancy, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about black shoes for a married man: An unpleasant vision for a man to see that he is taking off his shoes. This dream indicates that the problems that arise between him and his wife will not end well and that he will divorce her. Likewise, if he sees that he is taking off his shoes, some interpreters said: If he loses only one of them, this indicates his death. The black shoes in a married man’s dream vary according to the man’s condition in reality. If he likes black and it is one of his favorite colors, then this dream means that the man will have a very good and abundant diet, and he may have a new job opportunity, or he will get a lot of money, or he will hear good and long-awaited news. If the man does not prefer The color black means weak eyesight, as this indicates that he will encounter problems that will cause him sadness. Interpretation of a dream about wearing old black shoes: One of the dreams that does not bode well is for someone to see in his dream that he is wearing old black shoes, then this dream symbolizes worries and problems. If one sees in If he dreams that he is wearing tight, worn-out black shoes and cannot walk easily, this dream symbolizes...

title: Reading Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream out of fear for a married woman

preview.html: Reciting Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream out of fear for a married womanReciting Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream out of fear for a married woman is considered a great fortress according to most interpreters because of its great status in the Qur’an, which makes it one of the best verses in the Book of God. . Reading Ayat Al-Kursi in a dream. In addition to all the hadiths and fatwas that explain the virtue of this verse and its great place in our lives, there are secrets in another world parallel to our world, the world of dreams, that have many interpretations. It varies in location and nature, so you can read or hear it from the view. You can follow the article on reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream out of fear for a married woman via: Reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream for a married woman. After we learned to read Ayat al-Kursi in a dream out of fear for a married woman, the respected scholar Ibn Sirin, who has become famous over the centuries as the main interpretation of dreams, confirms that Seeing the verse indicates the abundance of its goodness. For those who see it in all areas of life, whether for nutrition, or for treating diseases. Or penetration into social and other life indicates that whoever sees himself reciting Ayat al-Kursi or Surat al-Baqarah while he is sick in his dream will find recovery, God willing. But if someone sees him reciting Surat al-Baqarah and has social problems with his family or relatives, then God Almighty will relieve him of their worries and resolve them. Their problems will be solved soon. Seeing a person reciting the longest surah of the Qur’an to his family indicates that this man fears for his children and protects them with this surah. If the person reciting Ayat al-Kursi sees himself in a dream, this indicates that he is an intelligent person and will have a large inheritance in the future, But because of him there will be many problems. Ibn Sirin explains the vision of reciting the Holy Verse to a person with the knowledge that God prolongs his life, heals him from every disease, and gives him a lot of money, Glory be to Him. Seeing a woman reading Ayat Al-Kursi in a dreamIf a married woman sees that she is reading the verse in In her dream, she reads Ayat al-Kursi in a dream out of fear for a married woman, as this indicates that she has many worries and fears and will leave soon. Seeing a pregnant woman reciting Ayat al-Kursi in a dream indicates that most interpretive scholars see a pregnant woman reciting this beautiful verse as an indication that her child will be born without exposing her to danger and she will live a happy life with him. Family. If he sees a woman to whom God has not blessed children reading Ayat Al-Kursi in her dream, this is good for her and it will be a consolation for her to give birth after God’s patience. When the woman saw that she hung the verse inside her house while she was sleeping, she tried to defend her house and protect it from enemies. Interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi for a single woman. The interpretation of a dream about reading Ayat al-Kursi for an unmarried woman is always a sign of prosperity. If an unmarried girl sees herself reading Ayat al-Kursi in a dream, this dream indicates that she will marry a righteous man who knows the teachings of her religion and adheres to them, and she will find happiness in her life. With him. . Excited. Also, reading in your dream indicates getting rid of an illness, passing an exam, or getting rid of anxiety. Reading Ayat Al-Kursi

title: Interpretation of a dream about offering food to the dead

preview.html: The meaning also depends on knowing the details of each vision separately and the reason for the condition and quantity of the food that appeared in it, and we explain this in detail in our article today from your website gptafser.com/, so follow us. Interpretation of the vision of offering food to the dead in a dream for a single girl. The unmarried girl who sees herself offering food to the dead And she was happy with that in the dream. It is a story that she will get a lot of money, food, and blessings in her life soon, and God knows best. But if an unmarried girl sees herself sad and offers food to the deceased in the dream. It symbolizes that the dreamer will lose money or lose something dear to her, and God knows best. An unmarried girl who is going through a period of extreme anxiety and saw herself offering food to a dead man who was hungry and insatiable. It indicates that the dreamer will be freed from sadness, the period of distress will end, and a beautiful life full of goodness and livelihood will begin, and God knows best. In the event that an unmarried girl dreams Providing food to the deceased, and sitting with him and eating food in a dream. A good sign that the desire will come true soon. It also means that he will solve a financial crisis that he is facing, and God knows best. Seeing the deceased in an unmarried girl’s dream and he refuses to eat her food in a dream. It is a sign of financial loss. For her, and God knows best. If an unmarried woman sees that she is feeding the dead, but she does not eat with him, and she does not actually eat that food, and that is during her sleep. This means that she accepts for others what she does not accept for herself, and it is a metaphorical expression of selfishness, and God knows best. See also: Interpretation of a dream About the dead, he gives them a home for the living. Interpretation of seeing the dead offering food in a dream to a married woman. As for the married woman who dreams of offering food to the deceased, but he refused to eat it and went to a place far from her in the dream. The evidence is that the dead person needs to beg and receive zakat from the dreamer, and God knows best. And when the married woman saw that her husband He asks her to bring him food. A dead person appeared and sat with him and ate with him in the dream. It means that the dreamer will receive a lot of goodness because she gave alms in the name of the dead person who appeared in her dream, and God knows best. A married woman is suffering from a financial crisis, and she dreams that she is offering food to the dead, but she did not She brings herself to him. The vision indicates that the distress can be eliminated and that she and her husband will receive a lot of money that may be an inheritance, and God knows best. Seeing the dead offering food and the dead were unknown to a married woman in a dream. A sign of the dreamer’s feeling of loneliness and isolation in her life, and her need to be kept She has her husband, and God knows best. Interpretation of the vision of serving food to a dead man in a dream and its meaning. A man watches himself giving food to the dead in a dream. A good sign that he will enjoy the best in the coming period. As for the married man who dreams of serving food in a dream to the deceased, the food was fresh and tasteful. Well. Seeing his kindness portends his wife’s pregnancy, and God knows best. A man saw himself offering food to a dead person in a dream, but he took it from him and went to a far place without eating from it. The vision here drew the dreamer’s attention to the fact that the deceased was in a dangerous condition until he arrived.
